resources.string:
Welcome to our Telemedicine app. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Please review the following policies regarding data collection, use, and sharing. 


1. Data Collection: We collect data to provide better healthcare services. This includes personal details (name, email, etc.), medical history, and communication logs with doctors. 

 2. Data Use: The collected data is used to manage appointments, facilitate doctor-patient communication, and improve our services. We do not sell your data to third parties. 

 3. Data Security: We implement advanced encryption techniques and secure servers to protect your data. Only authorized personnel can access your information. 

 4. User Rights: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. Please contact support for assistance. 

 5. Changes to Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be communicated through app notifications. 

 6. Contact Us: If you have any questions, reach out to us at support@telemedicineapp.com. 

 Thank you for trusting us with your healthcare needs. - The Telemedicine Team
